templates.template:
;+ ; init at object instanciation ;- pro ${classname}__test::beforeclass
end
;+ ; cleanup at object destroy ;- pro ${classname}__test::afterclass
end
;+ ; cleanup after each test case ;- pro ${classname}__test::after
end
;+ ; init before each test case ;- pro ${classname}__test::before
end
pro ${classname}__test::test_${cursor}
end
;+ ; Define instance variables. ;- pro ${classname}__test__define compile_opt idl2, hidden
define = { ${classname}__test, $$ ;your class variables here inherits iut_test } end
